fullStackDeveloper.name: Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer
descriptionLines: Greenfinn Technologies’ mission is to free humans from manual labor. We're starting with the hardest tasks first—highly repetitive outdoor work in the food and agriculture industry.

We’re looking for a Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer to develop the user experience and backend design of the next generation of robotics. We build hardware and software to do real work. Join our Team.
Our Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer will focus on robot control interfaces, machine learning tools, SAAS backends, and more.
You’ll work with a multidisciplinary team of robotics experts, software engineers, and industrial designers to design and produce the next generation of advanced robots.
The ideal will have some prior experience in the design of complex interfaces and API-driven backends.

responsibilities.title: As a Full Stack Developer and UI Engineer, you will

paragraphs: Develop and design user interfaces for advanced robotic control and monitoring;
Build API-driven SAAS backends
Create SAAS software services

Build a great company: it’s up to you how involved you want to be. We are an open book and you to share the experience of building a company—from identifying customers, to sales, to marketing. We want you to actively participate in, and learn, all aspects of our business.
Have an excellent background in software engineering and architecture (front to back);
Have some experience in developing software in C++, Python, C#, and JavaScript;
Have 3+ years’ experience in using Linux;
Have good experience in API design and service-oriented architectures;
Have a thorough understanding of software security and authentication;
Wish to free humans from hard, manual labor.

responsibilities.title: You may also have the following skills/attributes (desirable):

paragraphs: You understand robotic design and simulation;
You grow your food on your balcony or a community garden;
You have experience in machine learning techniques;
You appreciate a results-based, startup culture.

responsibilities.title: The benefits we offer to full-time employees:

paragraphs: A competitive salary;
Participation in the success of the company;
Personal skill development / a learning culture;
Job satisfaction through involvement in meaningful projects;
A host of other benefits that we will define as a team;
A transparent, entrepreneurial, startup culture. Want to be actively involved in sales and marketing? Then come and join us (but be ready to take on real tasks).

mechanicalProductDesignEngineer.name: Mechanical Product Design Engineer
descriptionLines: Greenfinn Technologies’ mission is to free humans from manual labor. We're starting with the hardest first—highly repetitive outdoor work in the food and agriculture industry.
We’re looking for a Mechanical Design Engineer to undertake applied robotics and help us to design advanced technologies. We build hardware and software capable of doing real work. Join our Team.
Our Mechanical Engineer will focus on the design of prototypes and marketready products.

You’ll work with a multidisciplinary team of robotics experts, software engineers, and industrial designers to design and produce the next generation of advanced robots, with an emphasis on bringing proof-of-concept machines to mass production.

The ideal candidate will have some prior experience in the design, manufacturing, and fielding of 3D product design and simulation in the consumer, industrial, or automotive markets. Experience with electromechanical assemblies would be an advantage.

responsibilities.title: As a Mechanical Product Design Engineer, you will:

paragraphs: Develop mechanical design for our autonomous indoor and outdoor robotics platform using 3D CAD software, simulation environments, a robotic operating system (ROS), and more;
Create models, drawings, and specifications for parts and assemblies;
Work with domestic and overseas manufacturing partners to develop manufacturable designs and scalable processes;
Participate in daily stand-ups, weekly sprint planning, retrospectives, and roadmap planning;

Build a great company: it’s up to you how involved you want to be. We are an open book and want you to share the experience of building a company—from identifying customers, to sales, to marketing. We want you to actively participate in, and learn, all aspects of our business.
Have mechanical design experience and solid engineering practices;
Have some experience in aspects of industrial automation, consumer products or robotics, such as 3D design, simulation of mechanical properties, or motion simulation;
Have used 3D CAD systems to design complex components;
Have experience in working from concept to mass production;
Wish to free humans from hard, manual labor.

machineLearningResearchers.name: Machine Learning Researchers
descriptionLines: Greenfinn Technologies’ mission is to free humans from manual labor. We're starting with the hardest first—highly repetitive outdoor work in the food and agriculture industry.

We’re are seeking Machine Learning Researchers that are interested in building perception and adaptive control systems that improve the performance, reliability, and generalizability of robot behaviors.

Well-qualified candidates will have a background in Computer Science, or a related field, and have prior work that demonstrates an ability to creatively apply modern machine learning algorithms to real-world problems. We are particularly interested in candidates with 1) experience using ML for visual perception or 2) experience applying reinforcement learning (RL) to dynamic control tasks.
